name: Moby
tagline: The Moby rigid body dynamics simulator
body:
### Features (current and slated)
| Feature  | Projected availability |
|---|---|
| Independent coordinate representation  | _current_  |
| Jacobian computations  | _current_  |
| Implicit joint constraints (for bodies with kinematic loops)  | Fall 2015  |
| Projected constraint stabilization  | Fall 2015  |
| [SDF](http://sdformat.org) support  | _current_  |
| Variable step integration  | Fall 2015  |
| Saving/restoring simulations  | _current_  |
| Energy dissipation for stable simulations | Fall 2015 |
| Gears | Fall 2015 |
| Revolute joints | _current_ |
| Prismatic joints | _current_ |
| Spherical joints | _current_ |
| Universal joints | _current_ |
| Fixed joints | _current_ |
| Joint limits | _current_ |
| Full unit tests  | Fall 2015  |

### Collision primitives supported
|   | Sphere | Box | Cylinder | Plane | Cone | Convex polyhedron | Heightmap |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| **Sphere** | • | • | | •| | Fall 2015 | • |
| **Box** | • | Fall 2015 | | • | | Fall 2015 | Fall 2015 |
| **Cylinder** |  | | | ○ | | | |
| **Plane** | • | ○ | • | N/A | • | • | N/A |
| **Cone** | | | | ○ | | | |
| **Convex polyhedron** | Fall 2015 | Fall 2015 | | •| | Fall 2015 | Fall 2015 |
| **Heightmap** | • | Fall 2015 |  | | N/A | | Fall 2015 | N/A |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
